title: Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game Ages 8 and Up
descriptions:
Introducing the Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game! Get ready for an exciting and laughter-filled gaming experience that brings the whole family together. 

Designed for ages 8 and up, this fast-paced Family Board Game will keep everyone on their toes. The Kids vs. Parents edition adds an extra layer of excitement as children go head-to-head with their parents in a battle of wits. 

With 2 decks of cards, each containing a whopping 130 cards, there's no shortage of fun and challenge. The kids' deck features familiar guess words that are perfect for young players, while the adult deck offers a varied selection of over 1,000 guess words to keep the game fresh and engaging. 

But be careful! Each card also contains forbidden words that you must avoid saying. If you slip up and utter a forbidden word, your opponent gets the point. So think fast and choose your words wisely!

To keep the game moving at a thrilling pace, a one-minute timer is included. Race against the clock as you try to get your teammates to guess as many words as possible before time runs out. And for an extra touch of excitement, the game includes a squeaker that adds a hilarious twist to the gameplay.

The objective of the game is simple: guess words without saying forbidden words. Rack up points and strive to be the team with the most points at the end of the game to claim victory.

Hasbro Gaming is a trusted brand known for their high-quality and entertaining games, and this Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game is no exception. It's the perfect choice for game nights, family gatherings, or any occasion where you want to have a blast with your loved ones.

Don't miss out on the fun! Grab your Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game today and create unforgettable memories with your family.

Introducing the Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game! Get ready for hours of fun and laughter with this exciting game that brings the whole family together. 

Designed for ages 8 and up, this fast-paced Family Board Game is perfect for both kids and parents. The Kids vs. Parents edition adds an extra level of excitement as you compete against each other to see who can guess the most words without saying the forbidden ones. 

With a total of 2 card decks, including a kids deck and an adult deck, there are endless possibilities for word combinations. The kids deck features familiar words, while the adult deck offers varied options, ensuring that every round is unique and challenging. 

You'll have a whopping 1,000 guess words to work with, spread across 260 cards. Each age group gets their own deck of 130 cards, guaranteeing equal opportunities for everyone. Plus, the game includes a squeaker and a one-minute timer, adding to the excitement and keeping the game moving at a thrilling pace. 

The objective is simple - get your teammates to guess the words on the cards without uttering any forbidden words. But be careful, because every time you slip up, your opponent gets the point! The winning condition is based on who has the most points at the end of the game, so strategize and compete to come out on top. 

Manufactured by Hasbro, a trusted name in gaming, this Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game is sure to be a hit at your next family game night. Don't miss out on the fun - grab your copy today and create unforgettable memories with your loved ones!

Don't miss out on the fun! Get the Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game today and create unforgettable memories with your family. Hasbro Gaming, a trusted brand in the industry, ensures a high-quality and enjoyable gaming experience for all.
